Docs.summary: Defines extension methods for IEnumerable that are used in the implementation of the Azure Search .NET SDK.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string ToCommaSeparatedString<T> (this System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T> enumerable);
.method public static hidebysig string ToCommaSeparatedString<T>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!T> enumerable) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function ToCommaSeparatedString(Of T) (enumerable As IEnumerable(Of T)) As String

Docs.typeparam: The type of elements that will be converted to strings.
Docs.param: The collection to turn into a comma-separated string.
Docs.summary: Converts the elements of a collection to strings and concatenates them into a comma-separated list, or returns null for null or empty collections.
Docs.returns: A comma-separated string, or null if enumerable is null or empty.
